class sampler.distribution.LinearEnvelop1D(grid, derivative, eval_value)[source]

Bases: Distribution

log_prob(x: Tensor) → Tensor[source]

Evaluate the density function \(log\tilde{p}(x)\) at given \(x\). The returned values should be of shape (x.shape[0],).

Parameters:

x (torch.Tensor) – the point(s) at which to evaluate the density function.

sample(num_samples: int) → Tensor[source]

Draw samples from the distribution. The samples should be of shape (num_samples, …).

Parameters:

num_samples (int) – the number of samples to be drawn.

training: bool
